xxx: One morning, Little Red Riding Hood asked her mother if she could go to visit her grandmother as it had been awhile since they'd seen each other
XXX: ONE MORNING, LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD ASKED HER MOTHER IF SHE COULD GO TO VISIT HER GRANDMOTHER AS IT HAD BEEN AWHILE SINCE THEY'D SEEN EACH OTHER

XXX: SO THEY PACKED A NICE BASKET FOR LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD TO TAKE TO HER GRANDMOTHER

XXX: REMEMBER, GO STRAIGHT TO GRANDMA'S HOUSE

xxx: said Little Red Riding Hood
XXX: SAID LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD

xxx: I'll be careful

xxx: But when Little Red Riding Hood noticed some lovely flowers in the woods, she forgot her promise to her mother
XXX: BUT WHEN LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD NOTICED SOME LOVELY FLOWERS IN THE WOODS, SHE FORGOT HER PROMISE TO HER MOTHER

xxx: She picked a few, watched the butterflies flit about for awhile, listened to the frogs croaking and then picked a few more
XXX: SHE PICKED A FEW, WATCHED THE BUTTERFLIES FLIT ABOUT FOR AWHILE, LISTENED TO THE FROGS CROAKING AND THEN PICKED A FEW MORE

xxx: Little Red Riding Hood was enjoying the warm summer day so much, that she didn't notice a dark shadow approaching out of the forest behind her
XXX: LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD WAS ENJOYING THE WARM SUMMER DAY SO MUCH, THAT SHE DIDN'T NOTICE A DARK SHADOW APPROACHING OUT OF THE FOREST BEHIND HER

XXX: SUDDENLY, THE WOLF APPEARED BESIDE HER

xxx: What are you doing out here, little girl
XXX: WHAT ARE YOU DOING OUT HERE, LITTLE GIRL
